summary: The module supplies test utilities for the Raster Vision plugin system, including a dummy analyzer that passes data unchanged, its corresponding configuration and builder, and a test case class that verifies plugin loading from modules and file paths and runs a minimal noâ€‘operation experiment. It also provides a small helper to register a plugin within the test environment.
business_intent: Validate and ensure the correctness of the plugin registration and execution workflow in the Raster Vision framework, enabling developers to confidently extend the system with custom analyzers and configurations.
